English.Text: Horror! The bullet passes through flesh and blood!" "Patricia!...Patricia!" wails the illusionist, as he rushes from the wings to cut the fine cat-gut strings that hold her in mid-air, "oh lord! Whatever have you done sirs!" She will die in his arms. That your soldiers were duped by a bit of make-up and a costume doesn't say much for their good judgement. They depart into the rain, which seems to fall harder and louder than ever before.
